a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: GDP per head vs. share of services in GDP, 2016
The vertical axis shows historical estimates of the share of services in GDP. The horizontal axis shows GDP
per capita, adjusted for inflation and for differences in the cost of living between countries.
Share of services in GDP (% GDP)
Data source: Our World In Data based on Herrendorf et al. (2014) and GGDC-10 (2015); Bolt and van Zanden - Maddison Project Database
Note: GDP per capita is expressed in international-$ at 2011 prices.
